amendment.description: An amendment to state that it is the sense of Congress that Congress should take up legislation to provide meaningful national quality standards for all health care plans and to assure enrollees in such plans access to an independent appeals process.

action.text: Mr. Hayworth raised a point of order against the Cardin amendment (A001). Mr. Hayworth stated that the content of the amendment was not germane to the resolution The Chair sustained the point of order.
